title: Notice of Company Establishment
tex:
Dear Sir/Madam, Season's greetings and best wishes for your continued prosperity.
We sincerely thank you for your exceptional support.

We are pleased to announce the establishment of our new company in Tokyo, and we take this opportunity to inform you of this milestone. At SEA-Biz Corporation, we aspire to be a company providing real estate brokerage, travel brokerage, medical brokerage, and IT services.

All of this would not have been possible without the generous support from all of you, and for that, we express our deepest gratitude. Going forward, we will redouble our efforts, and our entire team is committed to serving you sincerely to meet your needs. We humbly request your continued guidance and support.

Yours sincerely,

Record

Company Name: SEA-Biz Corporation
Date of Establishment: January 9, 2024
Business Activities:
・Providing real estate brokerage services
・Providing travel brokerage services
・Providing medical brokerage services
・Providing IT services

Contact Information:
Address: Room 2-0102, Lions Mansion, 5-4 Shinyamashita, Kanagawa-ku, Yokohama-shi, Kanagawa
TEL: 045-548-4991
E-Mail: info@seabiz.co.jp
